Engineer engineering projects and apply
engineering principles for pollution
control, recycling and waste disposal.

party. Hears arguments of both parties records and judgement of lower court.

decision. Delivers majority opinion of President appointments of PUISNE

Code 6210
Title Forestry and Related Workers Gatherer, Lac; Lac Cultivator infects host-
trees with lac insects and collects matured
6210.0300 lac from them by scrapping or clipping off
Forest Fire Watcher lac-bearing sheets. Ties brood-lac to fresh
host-trees with young shoots for
Forest Fire Watcher; Reserve Watcher transferring lac infection and allows larvae
patrols specified forest area to detect, to grow on trees for specified period to
prevent and control forest fires. Clears fire attain maturity. Scrapes and collects
lines in forest to localise fire within limited matured lac from infected trees using

Lofts Man, Ship Building repairs, using transit, plumb bob, tapes
and levels. Builds keel blocks, bilge blocks,
Lofts Man, Ship Building develops full size cradles and shoring for supporting slip in
measurements from drawings to prepare dry dock, building docks etc. using power
templates for manufacture of shell plates and hand wood-working tools. Positions
and other parts of ship. Studies drawings, and secures blocking and other structures
considers elevation and draws full scale on dock platform according to ship’s blue-
drawings with chalk on scrive board prints. Aligns vessel over blocks and
(wooden board on which various establishes reference points and lines on
measurements are marked to enable ship’s hull for locating machinery and
drawing of shell, shell plate, margin plate other equipment in accordance with
etc. for ship, to develop full scale ship’s alignment and shape. Fabricates
templates to be prepared) for making and installs furring pieces (timber strips of
templates. Draws full size lines of ship constant width but varying depth),
body on scrive board, ensures that plans aprons, uprights and other wood framing
of drawings of adjacent components in ship according to specifications and
agree and fit accurately and draws them shapes and finishes them. Nails or bolts
to full scale on it using scale contours, metal fittings, plates and bulk heads to
chalks etc. Instructs Carpenter in wooden parts of ship using brace, drill
preparation of templates according to bits, augers, spanners etc. and ensures
dimensions drawn on scrive board and correct alignment of hull, frame and
marks instructions on them with ink for fittings. Levels ground ways, runners,
guidance of fabrication section. Issues wooden blocks etc., erects props, fastens
templates to concerned section, explains standing ways by wire ropes, fits
details of measurements for fabrication of launching triggers and performs related
steel panels to form various components tasks to prepare entire launching ways to
of ship body and receives them back after launch a ship. Gets all material and timber
use. Stores templates in prescribed place salvaged after launching for use in
for further use and maintains their subsequent operation.
account.

7115.0800
7115.0700 Lascar Stager, Ship Building
Shipwright
Lascar Stager, Ship Building erects
Shipwright erects props and temporary temporary wooden structures and
structures to stabilize and support ship scaffoldings for placing staging planks
during, construction and repairs in shore. inside and outside ship under construction
Aligns ship structure according to or repairs to facilitate work. Erects steel or
designed centre line and angle of declivity tubular uprights and ledgers or cross bars
and plots and marks reference points and for resting staging planks as guided by
lines on building dock or way to maintain Serang and keeps them secure from
alignment of vessel during construction or strong winds and accidents. Assists
VOLUME III 996
Shipwright, Wood as directed and Carpenter, Boat Building
dismantles scaffoldings and other wooden
structures to arrange launching of ship. Is Carpenter, Boat Building constructs and
designated as SERANG, SHIP BUILDING if repairs boats, launches dredgers, barges
engaged in building and supervising etc. according to prescribed specifications
erection and removal of wooden by various carpentry processes. Lays keel
structures and scaffoldings and related on wooden fixtures and fits stem, stern
tasks. May assist Shipwright in aligning and templates as to keel with bolts and
ship structure and perform other tasks as nuts. Places cut planks on skeleton of boat
guided. to ascertain suitability and remodels their

Pipe Layer; Sewer Pipe Layer lays in buildings, gardens, workshops, stores,
concrete, stone ware or clay pipes to form ships etc., according to drawings or
sanitary drains and sewers. Receives instructions. Examines drawings and other
instructions regarding size and type of specifications or receives relevant
concrete, stone ware or clay pipe to be instructions. Cuts passage holes for laying
laid. Digs or gets earth dug along marked pipes in walls and floors. Cuts reams,
lines using spade, picks etc. to make threads and bends pipes according to
trenches for laying pipes. Levels and specifications. Lays pipes in cut passage
smoothens bottom of trenches to proper and assembles pipe sections with
gradient by scooping with shovels. couplings, sockets, Tee's elbows etc.
Receives pipes of required size lowered Levels position of pipes using sprit level
into trench manually or by pulley and for gravitational flow. Caulks joints, tests
adjusts their position by hand or crow-bar them for leakage with pneumatic or
for correct levelling and vertical and hydraulic pressure and secures pipe line
horizontal alignment. Joints pipes to structure with clamps, brackets, and
together using appropriate couplings, hangers. Fits water meters, taps etc. to
joints, rings etc. and closes joints by pipe where necessary. Repairs and
caulking with fibre and cement to prevent replaces leaky pipe lines, taps and joints
leakage. Tests joints by hydraulic or and provides connections to overhead
pneumatic pressure after sealing. Fills water tanks. Helps Plumber, General in
trench with earth to cover laid pipe and fittings sanitary fittings to buildings. May
rams earth to avoid sinking. Is designated join pipe sections and fittings.
